projects.name: Ahiaoma Reseller
projects.description: This is the reseller part of the Ahioama app

projects.name: Ahiaoma
projects.description: Ahiaoma is a modern online marketplace designed to connect buyers and sellers seamlessly, offering a wide range of products with a focus on convenience, affordability, and trust.

testimonials.author: Chinaemerem U.
testimonials.message: "I hired Ephraim to train students in Mobile Application Development, but I have seen him develop several mobile applications from the ground up for clients globally. He is daring and shows a good attitude to work. He is a professional. I recommend him."

testimonials.author: Emmanuel O
testimonials.message: "Working with Ephraim was a very great experience. He's very lively and you can always be assured he's a professional and he knows what he's doing and he enjoys doing it. I look forward to working with him more in the future."

testimonials.author: Ezediniru D.
testimonials.message: "I have worked with Ephraim Umunnakwe for several years, and he kept on delivering high-quality scalable projects and always implement following standard code practices. He is one of the best dev have ever met."

testimonials.author: Chinonso I
testimonials.message: "I hired Ephraim U. to help connect the mobile app frontend of my teams application that was built with Flutter to Firebase and he did a very good job by first resolving the issues we had with dependency on the frontend that was built with Flutter, and then connected it to Firebase that made the app fully function within one month."

testimonials.author: Mba A.
testimonials.message: "I hired Ephraim U. as a Flutter developer and CTO to help in building our company mobile application. He was responsible for writing the code from scratch to launching the finished product."

personalInfo.name: Ephraim Umunnakwe
personalInfo.title: Software Engineer
personalInfo.bio: Hi, I’m Ephraim Umunnakwe,  but most people know me as King Raym. I’m a Flutter-focused mobile developer from Nigeria, passionate about turning ideas into beautiful, functional apps. Through Raym Universe, I bring creativity and precision together to build digital experiences that inspire, solve problems, and stand out.
